findings.title: Owner can mint tokens below 1000000000 tokens
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to mint tokens with a value less than 1000000000 tokens.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges when not renounced, including minting tokens below 1000000000, burning allowed tokens through _nftManager, and changing the _nftManager address through the dev address.

findings.title: _nftManager can burn allowed tokens
findings.description: The _nftManager has the privilege to burn allowed tokens, which may lead to unauthorized token destruction.

findings.title: Dev address can change _nftManager address
findings.description: The developer address has the privilege to modify the _nftManager address, which may lead to unauthorized changes.
